content:
Here's a sample message you can use as a starting point:

"Hi [Client's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I'd like to schedule a meeting with you next week to discuss [topic/project]. I have a few time slots available between 12:00 PM and 5:00 PM. Would any of the following options work for you?

* 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM
* 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM
* 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM
* 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM
* 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM

Please let me know which one suits you best, or if you'd prefer a different time. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you and finalizing a time that works for both of us.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"

Feel free to customize it as needed to fit your tone and style!
